sentences.english: Age -old jade artifacts, gold and silver ornaments, and paintings - just to name a few.
sentences.chinese: 远古玉器，金银器，名画，还有好多其他的。

sentences.english: Hongshan culture jade large tomb tombs seem to have a certain combination.
sentences.chinese: 红山文化大型墓殉葬的玉器似乎都有一定的组合。

sentences.english: The older man was buried with jade and amber collars and bracelets and pearl ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 年长的男子的殉葬品有玉器琥珀项圈手镯，珍珠饰品。

sentences.english: Among the many jade objects found at Jinsha.
sentences.chinese: 在金沙发现的许多玉器中。

sentences.english: This hall exhibits jade ware and ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 这个馆陈列的是玉器和陶器。

sentences.english: By now jade carving transferred takes pleasure in it to use, mostly as handicraft.
sentences.chinese: 这时的玉器已转为赏玩之用，大多作为工艺品。

sentences.english: The Warring States period was a peak era in the history of Chinese jades.
sentences.chinese: 战国时期是中国玉器发展史上的又一个高峰。

sentences.english: The Kowloon Pearls, Precious Stones, Jade, Gold & Silver Ornament Merchants Association.
sentences.chinese: 九龙珠石玉器金银首饰业商会。

sentences.english: The aim of this article is to study the jade design thought in Kaogongji.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究《考工记》玉器设计思想。

sentences.english: It is essential to identify the colour of ancient jade in dividing the generation of ancient jade.
sentences.chinese: 对古玉颜色的鉴别是玉器鉴赏与断代的重要依据。

sentences.english: So far, I do not see what is inside the tomb of Fu Hao Hongshan jade.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，我没有看出妇好墓里哪些是红山的玉器。

sentences.english: Why don’t you buy some jade?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不买一些玉器呢？

sentences.english: That jack-of-all-trades often trades Chinese jades at this store.
sentences.chinese: 那个万能博士经常在这个店铺买中国玉器。

sentences.english: China has jade carvings, China has cloisonné.
sentences.chinese: 我们中国还有玉器，有景泰蓝。

sentences.english: Blue of Jingtai and jade ornaments are both popular.
sentences.chinese: 景泰蓝和玉器饰品都满受欢迎的。

sentences.english: This issue of jade carving simple simple, thickness varies, the modelling is anomalous.
sentences.chinese: 此期玉器简单素朴，薄厚不一，造型不规则。

definition: bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
the strokes of a character/calligraphy and painting
